channel.title: elasticsearch on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in elasticsearch on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 52: Elastic - with Steve Gordon
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by Steve Gordon to chat about the Elastic Stack, and his work on the Elasticsearch .NET client. Steve is a senior engineer at Elastic, maintaining the .NET client libraries. He’s a Microsoft MVP, Pluralsight author, speaker, and blogger, and user-group organiser. Steve’s social links Twitter Mastodon GitHub Website/Blog LinkedIn YouTube Links from the show Elastic Elasticsearch client Elastic Observability Kibana Logstash Snapshot testing with Verify episode Verify on GitHub LocalStack Devtip links Github CLI Flurl Dan’s Flurl YouTube video Listener Mention Danielle D
